ai_data_engineering.title: Simplified management of Amazon MSK with natural language using Kiro CLI and Amazon MSK MCP Server
ai_data_engineering.summary: In this post, we demonstrate how Kiro CLI and the MSK MCP server can streamline your Kafka management. Through practical examples and demonstrations, we show you how to use these tools to perform common administrative tasks efficiently while maintaining robust security and reliability.

ai_data_engineering.title: School of Product 2025 - L’approche produit n'existe pas, seules comptent les organisations produit.
ai_data_engineering.summary: Pendant plus de dix ans, Romain Delassus a assisté — parfois en spectateur, souvent en acteur — à des transformations numériques profondes. Et pourtant, malgré les compétences et la motivation du top management… beaucoup échouent encore à produire des services numériques réellement utiles, robustes et durables.

ai_data_engineering.title: How to Build a Data Platform That Actually Scales | Dagster
ai_data_engineering.summary: Learn the architecture patterns and principles that help data teams escape fragmentation, reduce maintenance burden, and build platforms that scale with growth.

ai_data_engineering.title: Serveur MCP avec SpringBoot – Partie 1
ai_data_engineering.summary:
Qu'est-ce que le SpringBoot MCP Server ?

Le SpringBoot MCP Server est une application Spring Boot qui utilise la librairie Spring AI MCP pour exposer vos données en tant qu'outils pour les modèles d'IA. Ainsi l'IA peut récupérer les données dont elle a besoin en fonction de ce qu'on lui demande, via des outils MCP standardisés. Nous utiliserons dans ce tutoriel Claude Desktop comme client MCP mais il existe aussi Cursor et d’autres client MCP.

ai_data_engineering.title: Serveur MCP avec SpringBoot – Partie 2
ai_data_engineering.summary: Jusqu’ici nous utilisions MCP inspector en STDIO ce qui ne peut faire fonctionner notre serveur quand local. Mais grâce au protocole HTTP on peut faire tourner notre serveur sur N clients et ce tuto est là pour vous montrer comment faire.

data_modeling_governance.title: Unifying governance and metadata across Amazon SageMaker Unified Studio and Atlan
data_modeling_governance.summary: In this post, we show you how to unify governance and metadata across Amazon SageMaker Unified Studio and Atlan through a comprehensive bidirectional integration. You’ll learn how to deploy the necessary AWS infrastructure, configure secure connections, and set up automated synchronization to maintain consistent metadata across both platforms.

data_modeling_governance.title: Python Typing Survey 2025: Code Quality and Flexibility As Top Reasons for Typing Adoption
data_modeling_governance.summary: The 2025 Typed Python Survey, conducted by contributors from JetBrains, Meta, and the broader Python typing community, offers a comprehensive look at the current state of Python’s type system and developer tooling. With 1,241 responses (a 15% increase from last year), the survey captures the evolving sentiment, challenges, and opportunities around Python typing in the [...] Read More... The post Python Typing Survey 2025: Code Quality and Flexibility As Top Reasons for Typing Adoption appeared first on Engineering at Meta .

etl_orchestration.title: How Workers powers our internal maintenance scheduling pipeline
etl_orchestration.summary: Physical data center maintenance is risky on a global network. We built a maintenance scheduler on Workers to safely plan disruptive operations, while solving scaling challenges by viewing the state of our infrastructure through a graph interface on top of multiple data sources and metrics pipelines.

news.title: How Beinex Strengthened Compliance & Reduced Operational Delays With AI Agents
news.summary: Beinex used Dataiku to deploy AI agents that automate compliance workflows, improve audit consistency, and cut multi-week processes down to days — giving clients faster decisions, clearer oversight, and scalable intelligence across regulated operations. Weeks-long processes reduced to just days through workflow automation
